name: @tb.p/dedupe

scripts.patch: git add . && git commit -m patch-update && git push && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.minor: git add . && git commit -m minor-update && git push && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.major: git add . && git commit -m major-update && git push && npm version major && npm publish --access public

description: A powerful file deduplication tool that quickly identifies and manages duplicate files. Features both CLI and web interfaces, detailed visual reporting, automatic cleanup options, and smart space-saving statistics. Reclaim your storage space with ease.
